section.heading: Scope.
section.text: Except as otherwise provided in ยง 50-1541.28, this chapter shall apply to any transaction, certificate of title, or record relating to a vessel, even if the transaction, certificate of title, or record was entered into or created before January 1, 2016.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 20-215: Section 32 of D.C. Law 20-215 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2016.
